sentences.en: " Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation. "
sentences.cn: “ 你总要警醒祷告, 免得入了迷惑. ”

sentences.en: Always yield to temptation, because it may not pass your way again.
sentences.cn: 尽量向你的愿望靠拢, 因为机会可能不会再来.

sentences.en: He concealed his excitement and resisted the temptation to get up and pace about.
sentences.cn: 他掩盖着内心的兴奋,控制着自己的冲动,一动不动的坐着.

sentences.en: He stifled his temptation to take hold of Ivy and shake her.
sentences.cn: 他压抑住想要抓住艾薇摇晃她的冲动。

sentences.en: However, I couldn't resist the temptation.
sentences.cn: 然而, 我抵挡不住那种引诱.

sentences.en: I couldn't resist the temptation to tease Ollie.
I finally gave in to the temptation and had a cigarette.
sentences.cn: 我最终还是屈从诱惑，抽了一支烟。

sentences.en: I have been unable to resist the temptation to include a final chapter.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很有必要增加最后一章.

sentences.en: I should congratulate you that you resisted the temptation.
sentences.cn: 我应向你祝贺,你抗住了这种引诱.

sentences.en: Resist the temptation to buy the item until you’re certain you need it.
sentences.cn: 要抵挡住购买的诱惑，除非你确有需要。

sentences.en: The fellow could never resist the temptation to be melodramatic, Walden thought.
sentences.cn: 这家伙总想一鸣惊人, 沃尔登想.

sentences.en: The temptation to recognize apomictic microspecies ( agamospecies ) as taxonomic species is far greater.
sentences.cn: 把无融合生殖小种 ( 无性种 ) 作为分类学上的种来承认,这点具有更大的迷惑性.

sentences.en: The temptation to use them is likely, sooner or later, to prove overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 迟早会使跃跃欲试的诱感变成压倒一切的力量.

sentences.en: The temptation would grow to take out our frustrations on Saigon.
sentences.cn: 由于我们遭到挫折而要同西贡算帐的引诱力会增加.

sentences.en: There is a temptation to suppose that this is not enough.
sentences.cn: 我们总是会认为,这一点还是不够的.

sentences.en: Unhappily, Forbes could not resist the temptation to make money on the side.
sentences.cn: 不幸, 福布斯禁不住从中谋利.

words.tran_cn: 诱惑；引起；冒…的风险；使感兴趣

trans.tran_en: a strong desire to have or do something even though you know you should not
